code: import axios from"axios";class ProvaApi{constructor(){this.axiosClient=axios.create();this.makeRequest=async url=>{try{const fullUrl="https://cors-anywhere.herokuapp.com/https://www.fotmob.com/".concat(url);const response=await this.axiosClient({method:"GET",url:fullUrl});return response;}catch(error){console.error(error);throw error;}};this.makeSearch=async url=>{try{const fullUrl="https://cors-anywhere.herokuapp.com/https://apigw.fotmob.com/".concat(url);const response=await this.axiosClient({method:"GET",url:fullUrl});return response;}catch(error){console.error(error);throw error;}};}}export default ProvaApi;
